contentrichtext.text: '''[[Taunton]]''' is the county town of [[Somerset]]. It may also refer to: ==Places== In Great Britain: * [[Taunton Deane]], a local government district with borough status in Somerset * [[Taunton Stop Line]], a World War II defensive line in south west England * [[Taunton Racecourse]], located near the town from which it takes its name In Australia: * [[Taunton National Park]], a scientific national park in Queensland In the United States: * [[Taunton, Massachusetts]] * [[Taunton, Minnesota]] * [[Taunton, New York]] * [[Taunton River]], historically called the ''Taunton Great River'', a river in southern Massachusetts ==People== * [[Baron Taunton]], defunct British peerage title * [[Kristen Taunton]], Canadian field hockey player * [[Mack Taunton]], vocalist * [[Scott Taunton]], media executive * [[Sussan Taunton]], Chilean actress == Other == * [[Taunton train fire]], a fire in a sleeping car train on 6 July 1978 * [[Taunton Period]], a British Bronze Age metalworking period * [[Taunton Press]] * [[The Siege of Taunton]], during the English Civil War * Taunton's Grammar School Southampton, see [[Highfield, Hampshire]] In fiction: * [[List of Star Wars creatures#Tauntaun|Tauntaun]], a creature in the ''Star Wars'' universe {{disambig|geo|surname}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Taunton}} [[Category:English toponyms]] [[Category:English-language surnames]] [[Category:Surnames originating in England]]
